entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
